node_info.name: convertToFile
node_info.description: Convert JSON data to binary data

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Transform input data into a CSV file

options.name: Convert to CSV
options.description: Transform input data into a CSV file

options.name: Convert to HTML
options.description: Transform input data into a table in an HTML file

options.name: Convert to ICS
options.description: Converts each input item to an ICS event file

options.name: Convert to JSON
options.description: Transform input data into a single or multiple JSON files

options.name: Convert to ODS
options.description: Transform input data into an ODS file

options.name: Convert to RTF
options.description: Transform input data into a table in an RTF file

options.name: Convert to Text File
options.description: Transform input data string into a file

options.name: Convert to XLS
options.description: Transform input data into an Excel file

options.name: Convert to XLSX
options.description: Transform input data into an Excel file

options.name: Move Base64 String to File
options.description: Convert a base64-encoded string into its original file format

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to reduce the output file size

options.name: compression
options.description: Whether to reduce the output file size

options.name: delimiter
options.description: The character to use to separate fields

options.name: fileName
options.description: Name of the output file

options.name: headerRow
options.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names

options.name: sheetName
options.description: Name of the sheet to create in the spreadsheet

properties.name: sourceProperty
properties.description: The name of the input field that contains the base64 string to convert to a file. Use dot-notation for deep fields (e.g. 'level1.level2.currentKey').

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to add special marker at the start of your text file. This marker helps some programs understand how to read the file correctly.

options.name: addBOM
options.description: Whether to add special marker at the start of your text file. This marker helps some programs understand how to read the file correctly.

options.name: dataIsBase64
options.description: Whether the data is already base64 encoded

options.name: encoding
options.description: Choose the character set to use to encode the data

options.name: fileName
options.description: Name of the output file

options.name: mimeType
options.description: The MIME type of the output file. Common MIME types.

subProperties.name: addBOM
subProperties.description: Whether to add special marker at the start of your text file. This marker helps some programs understand how to read the file correctly.

subProperties.name: dataIsBase64
subProperties.description: Whether the data is already base64 encoded

subProperties.name: encoding
subProperties.description: Choose the character set to use to encode the data

subProperties.name: mimeType
subProperties.description: The MIME type of the output file. Common MIME types.

hints.text: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
